SEARCH
Package com.xebisco.yield

Klasse Entity2D

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.Entity2DContainer
com.xebisco.yield.Entity2D
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Disposable
public final class Entity2D extends Entity2DContainer implements Disposable
The Entity2D class is a final class that extends Entity2DContainer and implements Renderable and Disposable, and contains various methods and properties for managing components and rendering.

    • containsTag

      public boolean containsTag(String tag)
      This function checks if a given tag is present in an array of tags.
      Parameter:
      tag - The parameter "tag" is a String representing the tag that we want to check if it exists in the "tags" array.
      Gibt zurück:
      A boolean value is being returned.

    • getComponent

      public <T extends ComponentBehavior> T getComponent(Class<T> componentType, int index)
      Get the component of the specified type at the specified index. The first line of the function is a generic type declaration. This is a way of saying that the function will return a component of the specified type
      Parameter:
      componentType - The type of component you want to get.
      index - The index of the component you want to get.
      Gibt zurück:
      A component of the specified type.

    • getComponent

      public <T extends ComponentBehavior> T getComponent(Class<T> componentType)
      Returns the first component of the specified type, or null if no such component exists.
      Parameter:
      componentType - The type of the component to retrieve.
      Gibt zurück:
      The first component of the given type.
